author: Special Correspondent
text:
The bill collection centre of the Puducherry Electricity Department which was attached to the office of the Junior Engineer/Town West (Operations and Management) and functioning at No. 2, Ist Cross Street, Jhonsy Nagar, Nellithope, Puducherry has been shifted to Mahatma Gandhi Government Middle School, Savripadayatchi Street, Nellithope.

A press note from V. Sridharan, Executive Engineer, PED, appealed to the public/consumers under the jurisdiction area of Town West (O&M) to pay current consumption charges bills at the new office.
title: PED bill payment centre shifted
